name: Natural Soap
description:
Gourmet Foods create our natural line of bath soap. Great for sensitive skins and those who prefer an unscented bath soap. Each soap features a select ingredient known for its wonderful skin benefits.

Your skin needs nurturing soap, aromatically scented with natural ingredients that are detergent free and chemical free; drenching your skin in moisture. Our handcrafted soap is a hard, long lasting, family bath bar for use in the shower, bath, and as a healthy shampoo. Makes a wonderful soap gift for someone special. Each soap has a moisturizing formula, with retained glycerin. You won't want to go back to commercial detergent bars again.

We have included rich coconut cream, white clay, soothing colloidal oatmeal, and tussah silk in our handmade soaps along with the finest all natural skin loving oils and unrefined butters. Your skin will thank you each time you use this essential soap. Warm intentions exude from each bar, lovingly crafted for all skins, but especially dry sensitive skins. Indulge in a creamy, bubbly lather.

Listing is for one 4.25 oz bar of cold process soap, made in small fresh batches, not wrapped, comes with a small product label. Gift wrapping available.

Gourmet Ingredients: Saponified Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Rice Bran Oil, Castor Oil, Shea Butter, Cream, Clay, Silk; Select Ingredient.

Allow soap to air dry between each use.
Appearance varies in handmade soap.
Enjoy your little work of art!

name: Holiday Soap
description:
Celebrate a birthday, new year's, valentine's day, mother's day, father's day, parties, a bridal or baby shower, all with favor/sample/guest soaps! Great for travel too.
